notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: Tyramine is an alkaloid found, among other places, in mistletoe and ripe cheese. How would you synthesize tyramine from benzene? From toluene?
